test.name: 02 id field is a valid 128 bit unsigned integer/UUID

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select distinct id from rf2_cr_irefset_full where not isValidUUID(id);

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select distinct effectiveTime from rf2_cr_irefset_full where NOT isValidTimeFormat(effectiveTime);

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select id, active from rf2_cr_irefset_full where active != 1 AND active != 0;

test.name: 05 moduleId is a descendant of 900000000000443000|Module| within the metadata hierarchy

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT distinct moduleId FROM rf2_cr_irefset_full WHERE NOT isValidModuleId(moduleId);

test.name: 06 refsetId is a descendant of 900000000000455006 | Reference set | within the metadata hierarchy

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT distinct refsetId FROM rf2_cr_irefset_full WHERE NOT isValidRefsetId_cr(refsetId);

parameter.name: query

test.name: 08 Only one reference set member record with the same id field will be current at any point in time

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select id,effectiveTime,count(*) from rf2_cr_irefset_full group by id, effectiveTime having count(*) > 1;

test.name: 09 refSetId and referencedComponentId fields will not change between two rows with the same id, in other words they are immutable

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT id,refSetId,referencedComponentId FROM rf2_cr_irefset_full GROUP BY id HAVING COUNT(distinct refSetId,referencedComponentId) > 1;

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select id, effectiveTime,moduleId from rf2_cr_irefset_full as refset where moduleId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<FULL>);

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select id, effectiveTime,refsetId from rf2_cr_irefset_full as refset where refsetId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<FULL>);

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select distinct value1 from rf2_cr_irefset_full where NOT isPositiveInteger(value1) AND value1 != 0;

test.name: 13 All currently active references are unique within rf2_cr_irefset_active

parameter.name: query
